name: WRITE RECORD
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the OPENV/SAVE commands.

parameters.name: err_label
parameters.description: err_label - label - Optional - This is the label to go to if an error occurs while writing to this non-TAS file.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Write non-TAS Record.
